description:

To equip you with the skills and knowledge you need to change the world with code, we have crafted talks and codelabs all about Android, Web, Cloud, and Google latest technology from the experts.

---

Date: Sunday, November 26, 2017

Time: 10.00 - 17.00

Place: Circle Coworking Space Semarang
Jl. Timoho Raya / Jl. Imam Suparto No.50, Bulusan, Tembalang, Kota Semarang, Jawa Tengah 50277

---
Register here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeCx6b1vBe9yloyUFDdB8ONrEix1DQLyDXlGmXHPqPe7KP0BA/viewform

What you need to prepare in this session:
- Don't forget to bring laptop, and make sure you already install Google Chrome with latest update
- About Mobile Site Certification: https://developers.googleblog.com/2017/04/introducing-mobile-sites-certification.html
- We've put together a study guide that covers everything you'll need to know. (https://support.google.com/partners/answer/7327828?hl=en&ref_topic=7327827&visit_id=1-636245183000401518-2101903703&rd=1)
- If you already learn that study guide and ready to take the exam, take the exam here: https://www.google.com/partners/#p_mobilesitescertification
- Online course for mobile site certification: https://academy.exceedlms.com/widgets/google_partners/enroll/o7QRxVL1JC51XJsaYG7kTbMq?hl=en-US

After you register, we will send you a confirmation email prior to your attendance via [masked] by Saturday, 25 November 2017. We cannot guarantee your slot unless you get a confirmation email.
Thanks and see you!

description:
Only register in this form: http://bit.ly/io18-semaranglive

Google I/O Extended 2018 - Live Viewing Party Indonesia:
What's Next from Google?

Google I/O is an annual developer-focused conference held by Google in San Francisco, California. Google I/O features highly technical, in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open web technologies.

Here, we invite you to watch live session and connect with other developers at Google I/O Extended 2018 - Live Viewing Party events across Indonesia.

What to expect from Google I/O Extended?
- Exclusive talk-show with experts
- Live report straight from I/O in Mountain View
- Play the games and win Google swags
- Live streaming I/O Keynote

When?
Tuesday, 8 May 2018
8 PM - 2 AM

Where?
Emerald+Chrystal, Lantai 2, Ibis, Simpang Lima, Semarang
Jl. Gajahmada No.172, Pekunden, Semarang Tengah, Kota Semarang, Jawa Tengah 50134, Indonesia

Detail info about Google I/O 2018: https://events.google.com/io/
I/O Extended 2018: https://events.google.com/io/extended/

Google I/O is an annual developer-focused conference held by Google in San Francisco, California. Google I/O features highly technical, in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open web technologies.

In Google I/O Extended 2018 Recap Semarang, we will have discussions from all range of topics; such as Flutter, Android Jetpack, Material Theming, and Machine Learning from the experts in the field.

Here, we invite you to connect with other developers at Google I/O Extended 2018 - Recap events across Indonesia.

name: Next 18 Extended - Semarang
description:
RSVP HERE:

The Google Cloud Next '18 conference just concluded in San Francisco (from Jul 24-27) bringing together experts, partners and customers of Google Cloud products to share ideas and make the cloud stronger and more productive for everyone.

The "Next 18 Extended" events bring those ideas and experience to communities with local events that cover key announcements and provide hands-on learning opportunities. The Google Developer Group Semarang is holding Next 18 Extended event as described below.

- Introduction to Google Cloud Platform
- Introduction to TensorFlow / DialogFlow

Join us for a recap of key announcements and tech deep dives from Google Cloud Next 18, with tech talks from experts and attendees.

name: Cloud Study Jam - Deploying Application
description:
Get hands on workshop with Google Cloud technologies. You will learn the fundamental tools and capabilities of Google Cloud. Especially in this session is about Deploying Application. We will discuss how to implement API management with Google App Engine, Firebase, Apigee, etc.

There are several benefits for the participant such as:
- Free access to Qwiklabs hands-on labs, a $55+ value
- Earn Google Cloud badges to show your skills and expertise
- Sharing with experienced fasilitators

Note:
- Bring your laptop

Limited only 60 seats.
Register now!
http://bit.ly/CSJ-SMG-DeployingApp

name: Cloud Study Jam - Kubernetes
description:
Get hands on workshop with Google Cloud technologies. You will learn the fundamental tools and capabilities of Google Cloud. Especially in this session is about Kubernetes in the google cloud. We will discuss how to implement with Docker, K8S, GKE, Kubernetes Clustering etc.

There are several benefits for the participant such as:
- Free access to Qwiklabs hands-on labs, a $55+ value
- Earn Google Cloud badges to show your skills and expertise
- Sharing with experienced fasilitators

Note:
- Bring your laptop

Limited only 50 seats.
Register now!
http://bit.ly/CSJ-SMG-Kubernetes
